name: Looking For Cats In a Badly Drawn Forest
name_original: Looking For Cats In a Badly Drawn Forest
description:
Welcome to the badly drawn forest full of cute cats!


🐈‍ This game has 3 different levels, in a forest theme. 😺 Try to find 100 kitties in each level! Click on them to color them!



  • 🐱 Look for kitties in the woods.
  • 😹 Look for kitties in the cabin.
  • 😺 Look for them in the snow.
  • 😹 Look for kitties at the lake.
  • 🙀 Look for kitties in the mountains.

🐱‍ Look inside, around mountain tops and in the woods, but be careful, some kitties hide too well!

Key features:
  • 😹 300 different kitties to find!
  • 🙀 There are hints if there are difficulties!
  • 🐱‍ There is a zoom function to help you see the kitties!




👓 Use your imagination and a sharp eye to spot all the cats in the most unusual situations!
